tool_description: Get a users location data, quick and simple, no parameters needed!
name: User Geolocation
title: User Geolocation

api_list.name: Get User Location
api_list.description: Get precise location information for a user without the need for any additional parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://user-geolocation.p.rapidapi.com/ip-geo-location"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-geolocation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://user-geolocation.p.rapidapi.com/ip-geo-location"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-geolocation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
